categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Navigators' Guild was a guild located in the Unknown Regions of the galaxy that sent navigators to those who hired them. Void Guides were a type of navigator employed by the Guild.

The Navigators of the Guild were bound by a strict code of neutrality and an even stricter code of confidentiality. They were forbidden from discussing the operations and locations of any one client with any other client.
Among the personnel of the Guild, the Chiss were reputed for arrogance and condescension toward other sentient species.
